newsitem.title: ESTONIA: TRADE DEFICIT FALLS TO 1.5 BLN KROONS IN MAY.
newsitem.headline: TRADE DEFICIT FALLS TO 1.5 BLN KROONS IN MAY.

text.p: to 1.5 billion kroons in May compared to 1.9 billion kroons the
month before, the statistics office said on Monday.
The trade deficit with Finland increased to 675.7 million
kroons or by 41.9 percent since January 1997.
Russia replaced Finland as top export destination in May,
accounting for 16.6 percent of total exports. Exports to
Finland accounted 15.5 percent of the total.
Imports from Finland accounted for 25.1 percent of total
imports with imports from Russia accounting for 13.1 percent.
Note -- all figures are in billions of kroons unless otherwise
